page.title: 06Whittington School
page.content: The first part of the school was built in 1966 and a second part added in 1974.The headmaster is Mr.W.D. Molesworth.There are 5 class teachers and one part_time teacher.Every term we have educational visits.In the school there are 158 pupils with about thirty in each of the five classes.{Whittington School}are involved in Y.S.C.F which stands for Young Save the Children Fund.We have won the{Princess Anne Award}three times.In 1978 the award was presented at Buckingham Palace,in 1982 at Farnham Castle and in June 1985 at Glamis Castle.We sponsor an Indian girl Sumathi Â£65 a year to go to school.The School does a lot of sport.The boys play cricket and football and the girls rounders and netball.
